1538580.name: Astro To The Rescue
1538580.description:
Astro to the Rescue

Game theme:

An astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet inhabited by two alien species: the Lumis and the Shadows. The Lumis seek Astro's help to escape the clutches of the Shadows.

Gameplay:

Astro finds himself stranded on a planet of floating islands. As he explores, he encounters Lumis isolated on remote islands and decides to rescue them. Traverse through three exhilarating levels, each featuring unique challenges and environments. Collect powerful power-ups to aid your mission and find the exits to advance to the next level.

features:

  • Challenging Levels: Experience three distinct levels with increasing difficulty and intricate puzzles.
  • Power-Ups: Discover two unique power-ups that enhance your abilities and help you overcome obstacles.
  • Compelling Story: Uncover the mystery behind the Lumis and Shadows and assist Astro in his rescue mission.
  • Exploration: Navigate through floating islands, uncover secrets, and find hidden pathways.

join Astro:

Embark on an interstellar adventure, aid the Lumis, and outsmart the Shadows. Can you navigate the unknown, rescue the stranded Lumis, and save the day? Astro to the Rescue offers a perfect blend of adventure, strategy, and exploration.

Stay tuned for the release and prepare for an unforgettable journey beyond the stars!
1538580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
